title: 大家好,我叫Xia_Mi
author: Xia_Mi
txt_content: 我是建筑团队的一个建筑师,我爱建筑

replies.author: BensonQC
replies.txt_content: 你刚刚不是报道过了吗？

replies.author: Xin_Lu
replies.txt_content:
报道两次T T
再来报道一次吧T T
我叫人送你去末地 O(∩_∩)O~~

replies.author: Xia_Mi
replies.txt_content: 我做任务 发建筑服务器

replies.author: 史蒂夫一只
replies.txt_content: 恭喜你抽到了末地一日游！

replies.author: Ayamuta
replies.txt_content:
新人泥濠
新人再见

replies.author: 4O74Y74L74J7
replies.txt_content:
新人你好！
不过楼主被封了是什么情况！
